actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to establish certain limitations relating to the ownership of cable television franchises.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit any alien, foreign government, or any foreign-owned or partially foreign-owned corporation from owning a cable television system in the United States without reciprocity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to establish certain limitations relating to the ownership of cable television franchises.
